name: Alien Attack - OLC CodeJam 2021
description:
OLC CodeJam 2021

My first attempt at participating in CodeJam has been a tiring week but for now the efforts are paying off.

With the future theme, what else can I think other than space? For me, it's what I think about most when I imagine the future of space and space exploration, and with it wars.

This game is based on Demon Attack for the Atari 2600, but I've revamped the gameplay or so I hope to.

For now just the initial concept and still adding the necessary gameplay.

Arrow keys -> Move

Space -> Shot 

Z -> Shot Plasma Beam

ESC -> Exit Game

Sprites: Artwork created by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz)

Bg: Author:n4  - opengameart.org
